TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewImageKeyConverter extends System.Windows.Forms.ImageKeyConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將影像索引鍵的資料與其他資料型別相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image key to and from another data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來將轉換的映像相關聯的索引鍵值控制項與其他資料型別。The class is used to convert key values of an image associated with a control to and from other data types. 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[How to： 實作類型轉換器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of an . 請改為呼叫 類別的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ConvertTo (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, culture As CultureInfo, value As Object, destinationType As Type) As Object
public: override System::Object ^ ConvertTo(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture, System::Object ^ value, Type ^ destinationType);

param.name: context
param.span: 提供格式內容的 ，可用來擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個型別轉換子就是從這個環境叫用的。

span.span: A that provides a format context, which can be used to extract additional information about the environment this type converter is being invoked from.

param.span: 這個參數或這個參數的屬性可為 。

span.span: This parameter or properties of this parameter can be .

param.name: value
param.span: 要轉換的物件，通常為影像索引鍵。

span.span: The object to convert, typically an image key.

param.name: destinationType
param.span: 要將物件轉換成的類型。

span.span: The type to convert the object to.

summary.span: 使用指定的文化特性 (Culture) 資訊和內容，將指定的物件轉換成指定之型別的物件。

span.span: Converts the specified object to an object of the specified type using the specified culture information and context.

exception.span: 指定的 無法轉換成指定的 。

span.span: The specified cannot be converted to the specified .
